titles.title: ARTS Act
Arts Require Timely Service Act
A bill to expedite the adjudication of employer petitions for aliens with extraordinary artistic ability.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 10/17/2007--Introduced. Arts Require Timely Service Act or ARTS Act - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for expedited adjudication of an employer petition for a nonimmigrant alien with extraordinary ability in the arts (O-visa), or for a nonimmigrant alien who seeks to enter the United States as an artist or entertainer, or athlete (P-visa).
